The Price is WRONG: Julie Bowen and The Price is Right raise money for Planned Parenthood Posted at 1:22 pm on February 23, 2017 by Sam J. Share on Facebook Share on Twitter 
Years ago, when Bob Barker would talk about neutering and spaying at the end of The Price is Right, he meant your PETS, people. 
Julie Bowen, known as Claire Dunphy from Modern Family, made a guest appearance on The Price is Right to raise money for â€¦ Planned Parenthood.
